response.overview: Celebrate the Future Hand in Hand was the theme for the 15 month long Want Disney World Millennium Celebration starting October 1, 1999.  While the celebration was throughout Walt Disney World, the center of the celebration was Epcot, with an emphasis on human potential and the possibilities of the future.  The celebration included some changes for Epcot including the construction of a giant wand next to Spaceship Earth with “2000” and all new fireworks show “IllumiNations 2000:Reflections of Earth”.  We take a look at the first, and the last parade around Epcot’s World Showcase Lagoon the “Tapestry of Nations” which became the inspiration for Disney produced Super Bowl XXXIV Halftime show that year.  Maybe the biggest addition to Epcot was the Millennium Village, know now as World Showplace
response.title: Walt Disney World Millennium Celebration
